body.p: WebHelp is a form of online help that consists of a series of web pages (XHTML format). Its advantages include platform independence, ability to update content continuously, and it can be viewed using a regular web browser. The WebHelp system includes several variants to suit your specific needs. The WebHelp Responsive variant features a very flexible layout, is designed to adapt to any screen size, and is available for DITA document types. This section contains information about configuring a WebHelp Responsive system and customizing the output.
